description: This file implements parts of a Web Simple Server Object including a factory function WebCreateSimpleServer that creates instances of the server object. It contains licensing info, documentation comments, and one external function call to WebSsoCreate.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE WebCreateSimpleServer(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new Web Simple Server object by invoking WebSsoCreate with provided context handles.
